Title: pyramid_great
Content: This construction is a masterpiece of technology and architecture. Only countless years of intense labor along with a vast wealth could be spent to produce such a building. If left untouched, this pyramid will become a symbol; a monument to the ancient Egyptians. But, it is an awful lot of stone to just lie there undisturbed. Surely, youâ€™d be able to use it to build something better?
